content.rendered: The team behind Apollo Capital collectively has a combined 25 years experience in crypto assets and more than 85 years experience in venture capital and funds management. This unique blend of financial services experience and early adoption of crypto assets means the team is ideally placed to manage a portfolio of crypto assets.
